Login.Slogan: Here you can manage your tools, projects, inspections and reparations, and mutch more!
Login.LoginWrong: Email / Password is wrong or your user is not active!

MenuDashboard.HeadingMenu2: What do you want to do today?

ItemMenu.title: Projects
ItemMenu.description: Which projects the company made and see the details of ongoing projects.

ItemMenu.title: Inspections
ItemMenu.description: View the inspections that the tools have and the detail of each inspection.

ItemMenu.title: Tools
ItemMenu.description: Here you can see the tools the company has as well as their details such as it's state.

ItemMenu.title: Repairs
ItemMenu.description: View the tools that need a repair, as well as the details of each repair.

ItemMenu.title: Users
ItemMenu.description: View the list of users of the company.
